original_text: We did something very bad at Peor. Even now, we have not made it right. The Lord brought a bad disease to punish us as his people.
korean_text: 브올의 죄악으로 말미암아 여호와의 회중에 재앙이 내렸으나 오늘까지 우리가 그 죄에서 정결함을 받지 못하였거늘 그 죄악이 우리에게 부족하여서

sentences.original_text: We did something very bad at Peor.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 뻬오르에서 매우 나쁜 일을 저질렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: Even now, we have not made it right.
The Lord brought a bad disease
to punish us as his people.
